RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 29. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OXBOW'S RIDE broke sharply, chased the pace along the inside into the turn, shifted out two wide, made the lead at the quarter pole then widened the balance of the trip under left handed urging to win as much the best. SOMETHING ON TAP stalked the pace along the inside, shifted out on the turn, had a mild late rally three wide and finished well clear for second. CANTRUNWITHBIGDOGS passed tiring rivals in the five path. FAST AS FAST CAN B sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace for seven sixteenths of a mile, remained a sharp threat into the stretch and weakened late. MARK'S BUDDY JACIN failed to menace. COSI EXPRESS trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Mark's Buddy Jacin
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Cantrunwithbigdogs
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals, 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Something On Tap
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, angled out turn, rallied 3w, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Oxbow's Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, chased, 1/4pole lead, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Fast as Fast Can B
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace 1/4 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Cosi Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NIGHT TIME RULER away alertly, set all the pace while nicely rated, was put to a right handed stick in mid stretch, drifted out late while under a hand ride and drew clear. BLOOD MOON chased the winner, was set down on the far turn, inched closer nearing the quarter pole, his rider steadied past the sixteenth pole when the winner drifted out and finished second best. UPTOWN stalked the pace two wide and went evenly. FALCONS FURY close up along the inside, was through after a half. BOURBON WISDOM hopped at the start and trailed. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF BLOOD MOON LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ODER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Falcons Fury
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Night Time Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drifted out late, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Wisdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Blood Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inched closer 2nd turn, steadied late, jock claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2 wide, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OLIVIA'S JOY away alertly, sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace, drifted out a bit and prevailed under brisk handling. MANGORITA never far back, had a mild late rally in the seven path and finished second best. LEMONSANDDIAMONDS chased the winner two wide and was outfinished. ICY RAIN well placed, offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. PACKIN had good early speed three wide, swung wide and was through after a half. THEYCALLMELEE off slowly, was no factor. TISTAAHAL trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Theycallmelee
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Tistaahal
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Lemonsanddiamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mangorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, mild rally outside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Olivia's Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, clear lead, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: Packin
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 3 wide, swung wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WICKED CHANCE never far back, circled river five then two wide through the turn, made the lead before the furlong marker then finished full of run to win going away. CHROMED IMPULSE pressed the pace three then four wide, rallied to make the lead on the turn, dropped to the rail, battled with the winner until deep stretch then was no match while well clear for second. GRAND DEAL trailed into the stretch, swung wide and found his best stride late. EL SICARIO vied for lead the lead along the inside into the stretch then failed to offer the needed response. ONEMORANDTHECHECK pressed the pace two wide while hung out in the six path into the turn then dropped back. BIG BAD BEAST offered a mild bid between horses two wide on the turn then came up empty. MASTER sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace off the rail in the five path into the turn then weakened. WHISKEY SUNRISE had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sunrise
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace 5path, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: El Sicario
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Onemorandthecheck
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, 6path, dropped back turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Chromed Impulse
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-4wide, led turn, battled, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bad Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, between horses, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Chance
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, circled 5 wide turn, full of run, going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LANALIKESCHOOCHOOS broke in full stride to set all the pace, widened into the stretch and won under strong handling. DANZING CHICK stalked pace into the stretch, dug in three wide and finished clear for second. ANCHORWOMAN bore in at the start, moved up four wide on the turn then was outfinished. ALWAYS MISCHIEVOUS pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then faded. WRITTEN CONSENT failed to menace. GOING TO TOWN was no threat. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN was no factor. SMARTY PANTS with the second flight two wide, failed to respond. DERBY WIFE showed little. FULL TIME STRUTIN was outrun. TWILIGHT BEAUTY was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Yacht Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Written Consent
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Derby Wife
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Anchorwoman
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in start, middle move, 4wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Full Time Strutin
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Going to Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Danzing Chick
ENTRY.OWNER: DaCosta Jason and Brown John E
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, determinedly 3 wide, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Lanalikeschoochoos
ENTRY.OWNER: Flower City Racing LLC and Meyer Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, shook clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Smarty Pants
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Always Mischievous
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HITSVILLE away alertly, set all the pace, turned back a strong bid from the runner up in deep stretch, responded under right handed urging and proved best in a game effort. WAITES KINGDOM pressured the winner then entire trip, loomed boldly two wide past the furlong marker but was denied. ONE FOR THE MONEY trailed around the clubhouse turn, surged between rivals two wide before a half, dropped back on the far turn then came on again late three wide. BON DEUX vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch then weakened. C C'S CLEAR CREEK forwardly placed outside, also weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Hitsville
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, repulsed bid, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Waites Kingdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bid late 2 wide, denied

ENTRY.NAME: One for the Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, between horses, dropped back 2nd turn, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Deux
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Clear Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace outside, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allow ances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DERBY INCLUDED allowed to settle, closed willingly four wide into the far turn, made the lead before the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace and drew off under strong handling. LIL RICKYS JEWEL away alertly, set the pace in the two path for nearly six furlongs, shifted out to the four path in upper stretch but was no match for the winner. VENTURE ON well placed, offered a bid three wide nearing the top of the stretch then was outfinished. THAT'S THE WAY was bumped at the start, trailed for a little over a half then improved position in the three path. HEIDI'S SINATRA was no threat. TWINSPIREDJOEY vied for the lead along the inside, lacked room into the far turn then weakened in the stretch. DANCE MOVES pressed the pace three wide into the second turn then gave way. MARVIN'S EXPRESS bumped THAT'S THE WAY at the start then was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Twinspiredjoey
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, no room 3/8pole, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Rickys Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2nd turn, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Venture On
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Dance Moves
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide 2nd turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Derby Included
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed willingly, 4 wide, full of run,drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Marvin's Express
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Beckett Racing Team LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: That's the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, improved 3path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 64. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE MIRACLE KIUT sped to the lead leaving the chute, set all the pace and finished full of run through the stretch under strong handling to win going away. KAT TRAX never far back, rallied four then three wide through the stretch and finished second best. TRULY INCLUSIVE pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. LADY JASPER offered a mild bid along rail into the stretch then leveled off. HELLO SWEETS broke slowly, trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals along the inside. BIRDIE'S CHANTZ failed to menace. MARGARITA CINCO raced wide early and was no threat. PENNIESANDDIMES with the second flight, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Hello Sweets
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, passed tiring rivals, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Kat Trax
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: The Miracle Kiut
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pace, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jasper
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and S G M Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Birdie's Chantz
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Margarita Cinco
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Truly Inclusive
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Penniesanddimes
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, through after half,
